column1: #Text=" Bolin says : " I 'm never gon na let you go again !
#Text=" Mako says : " Okay , all right , Naga .
#Text=" Mako says : " You guys are okay !
#Text=I was just - It 's so good to see you .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's really good to see you , too .
#Text=" Mako says : " Do n't get all mushy on me , Chief .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh my gosh , it 's Lord Zuko !
#Text=" Mako says : " Uhm , forgive my brother .
#Text=We 're just really honored to meet you , Sir .
#Text=" Zuko says : " It 's a pleasure to meet you as well .
#Text=" Yin says : " You must be the Avatar .
#Text=Mako told me so much about you .
#Text=You are even more beautiful than I imagined .
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh , actually , that 's Asami .
#Text=" Yin says : " You are very muscular for a woman .
#Text=" Yin says : " What lovely young women .
#Text=Mako , why are n't you dating any nice girls like them ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Uh , so what happened to you two ?
#Text=" Mako says : " We were captured by Zaheer and taken to Ba Sing Se .
#Text=We were there when the Earth Queen was overthrown .
#Text=" Mako says : " Zaheer let us go .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Because he wanted us to find you and deliver a message .
#Text=" Mako says : " Zaheer is headed to the Northern Air Temple as we speak .
#Text=He said he 's gon na wipe out the new Air Nation and everyone in it .
#Text=Unless you turn yourself over to him .
#Text=" Korra says : " Zaheer 's threatening innocent lives just to get to me .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " He could be bluffing .
#Text=" Mako says : " He 's already taken out the Earth Queen .
#Text=" Korra says : " We need to radio Tenzin and warn him that the Red Lotus is coming .
#Text=Unfortunately , we do n't have a radio on the airship .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " There 's a portable radio on the jeep , but the signal will never make it to the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=" Lin says : " We need to get to a place that has a strong radio transmitter .
#Text=Hopefully she can get a hold of Tenzin at the air temple by the time we get to Zaofu .
